channel.title: HP Skillcape problem... :\
channel.description:
Other Issue: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,394906.0.html
Anyways, thing is. My HP Skillcape requires you to have 99hp. I mean, like, if you're hurt under 99 hp, you can't equip it. Also, all my other skillcapes can be equipped at any level... As in 1.
I'd like to know how I can make the HP skillcape equipable once you REACH level 115, and not actually need 115 to use it. I'd also like to know how I can make my other skillcapes' requirements 115.
(Yes, I mean 115, not 99. Trying to change it, and make sure once you get the level, you can use them, even if their stats are lowered.) ^^"
